content.1: Gather yourselves together, yea, gather together, O nation not desired;
content.4: For Gaza shall be forsaken, and Ashkelon a desolation: they shall drive out Ashdod at the noon day, and Ekron shall be rooted up.

content.6: And the sea coast shall be dwellings

content.8: I have heard the reproach of Moab, and the revilings of the children of Ammon, whereby they have reproached my people, and magnified
content.10: This shall they have for their pride, because they have reproached and magnified
content.13: And he will stretch out his hand against the north, and destroy Assyria; and will make Nineveh a desolation,
content.14: And flocks shall lie down in the midst of her, all the beasts of the nations: both the cormorant and the bittern shall lodge in the upper lintels of it;
